text: Patriarch Gregory of Constantinople may refer to: * Gregory I of Constantinople, Patriarch in 379–381 * Gregory II of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople in 1283–1289 * Gregory III of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople in 1443–1450 * Gregory IV of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople in 1623 * Gregory V of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople in 1797–1798, 1806–1808 and 1818–1821 * Gregory VI of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople in 1835–1840 * Gregory VII of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople in 1923–1924
title: Patriarch Gregory of Constantinople
